definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: be reproached, ashamed (Aramaism, v. RS:Proph. iv, n. 9; Aram. [[חֲסַד]] be put to shame, h.ased, [[חַסֵּד]] reproach, revile; [[חִסּוּדָא]], h.esdo0 shame, reproach, oft. in Targum LXX for [[חֶרְפָּה]]);—only

definitions.title: Pi.
definitions.body: Impf. [[פֶּן־וְחַסֶּדְךָ]] Pr 25:10 lest he reproach thee, expose thee to shame.
